thread.title: Report: DeSean Jackson’s home in gang-related invasion
thread.title_full: Report: DeSean Jackson’s home in gang-related invasion

author: Rob Tornoe, Philly.com
title: Report: DeSean Jackson’s home in gang-related invasion
text:
Jay Gruden, Jackson’ — Washington Redskins (@Redskins) 
When Jackson was cut by the Eagles nearly two years ago, he denied reports linking him 
“I would like to make it very clear that I am not and never have been part of any gang, Jackson said at the time . “I am not a gang member, and to speculate and assume that I am involved in such activity off the field is reckless and irresponsible. 
Jackson hasn’t played since tearing his left hamstring during Washington’s season opener against Miami on Sept. 13. He was initially expected to miss three to four weeks, but Sunday’s game will mark six weeks since the injury, and some are speculating Jackson’ 
“I can't see them bringing DeSean Jackson back to the tune of $9.25 million next season, “He's not reliable enough. Explosive, yes. But he's not very versatile or dependable.
